licenseNote: 124 checklist entries. Weights: mask shards 0.25 (20 shards = 5%), silk spool fragments 0.5 (18 fragments = 9%), remaining 86 items at weight 1 (86%). Total weight = 100. Variant / upgrade pairs aggregated with '-all' suffix where needed.

items.location_text: Effect: Fling needle as a harpoon with silk.
Effect: Wall-jump.
Effect: Charged attack.
Required: Defeat Widow. Effect: Play songs that can open special Needolin Doors, reveal secret lore, and make enemies / NPCs sing.
ACT 3: Effect: Fling upwards.
Effect: Sprint at blinding speed, beyond one's natural limits. Tip: You can press the sprint button while in the air to gain distance quickly.

Required: Cling Grip

At the top of a tunnel reached after an Arena Battle.
Required: Hit the box in the corridor below, entered via Breakable Ceiling.
Required: Complete Savage Beastfly Wish
Required: At the top of the Skull Cavern. You'll need to reach the bottom before it becomes accessible.

At the end of a precarious series of corridors, filled with Slubberlug and parasite-infested waters.

Required: Complete Dark Hearts Wish in Act 3.

Can only be reached in ACT 3.

At the very top of the Brightvein. After a length platforming sequence, use Silk Soar to reach the room it's in.
On a ledge reached by whacking the Lever at the edge of the magma-filled room. Keep jumping to avoid damage.

In a boobytrapped room high above the settlement, reached by dropping through the Locked Trapdoor and following the path. Once you reach the Lever, continue to the right - and watch out for boobytraps.
Required: Cling Grip. Tip: To reach this room, jump up the wall above this Breakable Wall.
Required: Cling Grip.
Required: Complete My Missing Courier. Can be purchased from Frey for 270 Rosaries.
At the top of a frosty area. Required: Cling Grip.
Sold by Grindle for 680 Rosaries.
At the very top of the platforming puzzle in the room below. Tip: You can hit the bottom of the platforms to change their positions!
In a room at the edge of the tunnels, initially entered here.

Required: Complete Balm for The Wounded Wish.
Required: Complete The Lost Merchant Wish. Can be purchased from Jubilana for 500 Rosaries.

Accessible once you've reached the Lever. Climb to the top floor, summon the elevator, then quickly slide back down the hole. Wait next to the lever for the elevator to pass, then jump down to find this spool fragment at the bottom.
Defeat Bell Beast. Regain the power to regenerate Silk within one's shell.

The first Hollow Knight: Silksong weapon upgrade comes from Pinmaster Plinney himself. He's located in the settlement of Bellhart, which is halfway between the regions of Greymoor and Shellwood.

The fourth and final Hollow Knight: Silksong weapon upgrade comes from Fleatopia. This is the most time-consuming activity since it's part of an over-arching objective: You must rescue all 30 Lost Fleas.
